name: Gift Certificate
description: Gift certificates can be purchased in any amount. A single certificate is equal to one skein of yarn ($32). To increase your gift amount, add to cart, then change the "Qty" field in the Cart. Shipping will be included when you check out at PayPal, which will pre-pay the shipping cost for mailing your gift skeins to your recipient. Instructions: Gifter: We will email you a printable certificate shortly after your order is placed (within a day or two), or you can print the one seen here and fill in the details yourself. Recipient: To redeem, visit http://ozark.bigcartel.com and write down yarns whose total price matches the amount on your certificate. Then just call or email us your: 1) yarn names and quantity 2) name 3) shipping address 4) order number (written on your certificate) ...and we’ll send mail you your colorful gift! store@OzarkHandspun.com 573-644-8736 (9am – 5pm Central Time)

name: Snowflake 2116
description: Fiber content: 65% mohair, 35% wool Weight per skein: approx. 50 grams Length per skein: approx. 40 yards Yarn weight: chunky Needle size: 19 Gauge per inch: 1 Buy enough for your entire project When purchasing our yarns, try to buy enough for the entire project from the same lot. Each batch is a unique combination of dyed wools. Additionally, as the sheep and goats age, their coats change color. These two factors make the yarn colors extremely difficult to duplicate later, so it’s important to purchase enough for your entire project. Ozark Handspun yarns are hand dyed with a range natural and synthetic dyes. The fibers are then picked and handspun with emphasis on unique texture. More about how it’s made. Knitting with our yarns Free patterns Care Hand wash, hand rinse in warm water. Lay flat to dry. Do not dryclean. Do not use bleach.
